text: 20.8: Ese 7.2; 38.2; 38.9; 38.15; VB 16.14; 20.10Ana kɨrar hɨgɨp, ana za kha harigi fhain ŋguir ki gumgi gu mbigi, ana mbe guiguigirga. Mbe kha zɨn rɨgi ntɨɨri, Gok gu Magok. Satan mbe fugɨp, ntara khavgirga. Mben ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi, mben vhɨrve khaŋ muuŋgi, mbe mbasɨk taan ki khɨɨiŋ fara muuŋgi.
